actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the applicability of duties upon certain aspects of the foreign repair of vessels.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to declare that duties imposed under such Act shall not apply to: (1) the cost of equipment or expense of repairs made in a foreign country with respect to LASH (Lighter Aboard Ship) barges documented under U.S. law; or (2) the cost of foreign-made repair parts for installation on such vessels in the United States or in a foreign country where they cannot be obtained from U.S. manufacturers and are imported into the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to the applicability of duties upon certain aspects of the foreign repair of vessels.
